          <title>
            <string language="en">Aerosols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aerosole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aérosols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aerossóis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aerosol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αερολύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aerosoles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates an aerosol can with a label indicating the gas inside it does not harm the atmosphere.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht eine Aerosoldose 
mit einem anzeigenden Kennsatz, daß das Gas nach innen es nicht die 
Atmosphäre schädigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre un bidon d'aérosol avec une
étiquette indiquant que le gaz à l'intérieur il ne nuit pas à 
l'atmosphère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra uma lata do aerossol com uma
etiqueta que indica que o gás para dentro ele não prejudica a 
atmosfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una latta dell'aerosol con 
un'etichetta che indica che il gas all'interno esso non non nuoc 
l'atmosfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί ότι ένα αερόλυμα μπορεί 
με μια ετικέτα που δείχνει αέριο μέσα δεν βλάπτει την 
ατμόσφαιρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una lata del aerosol con una
escritura de la etiqueta que indica que el gas adentro él no daña la
atmósfera.</string>
          </description>
